japanese: 四葉、来たぞ。
translation: Yotsuba, I'm here.

japanese:
はーい。
お待たせしちゃってごめんね。
もうすぐ着替え終わるから、そこで待ってて。
translation:
Okaaay.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
I'll finish changing soon, so please wait there.

japanese: あいつら来てるみたいだぞ。
translation: It looks like they've arrived.

japanese:
ったく、なに企んでんだか。
高校生の頃から変わっちゃいねぇ。
問題児だらけだ。
translation:
Good grief, what are they plotting?
They haven't changed since high school.
They're all troublemakers.

japanese: それって私も含めて？
translation: Is that including me?

japanese: お前が一番、問題児だったんだよ。
translation: You were the biggest troublemaker.

japanese: （そういや今朝も夢を見たっけな）
translation: (Come to think of it, I had a dream this morning.)

japanese:
（あの日を何度、夢に見るんだろう。
　そんな深く脳裏に刻まれるほどの――）
translation:
(How many times have I dreamt of that day?
 It's etched so deeply in my mind.)

japanese: （とんでもない悪夢だ）
translation: (It was such a terrible nightmare.)

japanese: お待たせ。
translation: Sorry to keep you waiting.

japanese: まだ俺は夢を見ているのか？
translation: Am I still dreaming?

japanese: 五つ子ゲーム、ファイナルだよ。
translation: It's the final quintuplets game.

japanese: 愛があれば見分けられるよね。
translation: If it's true love, you can tell us apart, right?

japanese:
皆様、本日はご多忙の中、
僕たちの結婚披露宴にお集まりいただきまして
誠にありがとうございます。
translation:
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking time
out of your busy schedules
to attend our wedding reception today.

japanese:
これまでお世話になった方々の前で
ようやく挙式を執り行えたことを、
大変嬉しく思います。
translation:
I am very happy to finally have our wedding ceremony
in front of everyone who has supported us so far.

japanese:
なにせ、プロポーズ自体は
５年前にすませていますから。
translation:
Because, you see, the proposal itself
had taken place five years ago.

japanese: 本当に……長い道のりでした。
translation: It...really has been a long road.

japanese: 五つ子ゲームって……。
translation: The quintuplets game...

japanese: 馬鹿か！　ってか四葉以外の４人！
translation: What a joke! Except for Yotsuba, you other four!

japanese:
こんなお遊びでウェディングドレス着てんじゃねぇ！
なにしてるかわかってんのか！
translation:
What are you doing, wearing wedding dresses
for this kind of game?
Do you even know what you're doing?

japanese: 確かにちょっと複雑だけど……。
translation: Sure, it's a bit complicated...

japanese: 思いついちゃったもんね……。
translation: But we just thought of it, you know.

japanese: それにお遊びじゃないよ。
translation: And it's not just for fun.

japanese: これでも花嫁の親族だからね。
translation: We're also relatives of the bride.

japanese: っていうのは嘘で私が花嫁本人です。
translation:
Well, that's a lie.
I'm the bride.

japanese: 違うよ、私だよ。
translation: No. It's me.

japanese: 花嫁といえば私！
translation: I'm the bride!

japanese: 風太郎ならわかるよね？
translation: You can tell, right, Futaro?

japanese:
ったく、馬鹿野郎……。
少しは分別のつく大人になったかと思えば。
translation:
Geez, you idiots...
Just when I thought
you'd become somewhat sensible adults.

japanese:
相変わらずのようで安心した。
俺を舐めんな。
translation:
It's a relief you still haven't changed.
But don't underestimate me.

japanese: お前だ。
translation: It's you.

japanese:
宴もたけなわとなりましたが
そろそろお時間のようです。
translation:
It seems the party is at its peak,
but it looks like it's time to wrap things up.

japanese:
最後に新婦様から親御様へ
感謝を込めたメッセージです。
translation:
Lastly, a message of gratitude
from the bride to her parents.

japanese:
お父さん、そして天国のお母さん。
私が今日、この日を迎えられたのは
２人がいたからに他なりません。
translation:
To my father, and my mother in heaven,
I would not be here today
if it weren't for the both of you.

japanese:
お母さんは私が小さな頃に
いなくなってしまいましたが、
その教えと愛はいつまでも私の中に残っています。
translation:
Although my mother left me when I was young,
her teachings and her love will always stay with me.

japanese: そして、お父さん。
translation: And, Dad.

japanese:
幼い私は、突然のことに気持ちの整理がつかず
反抗してしまう時もありました。
translation:
When I was young, I wasn't able to sort
out my feelings in the face of uncertainty,
and there were other times when I was rebellious.

japanese:
あの時はごめんなさい。
ですが、時間をかけてお父さんの気持ちを
知ることができました。
translation:
I will apologize now for those times.
However, in time I came to understand
how you felt, Dad.

japanese:
お父さんが私のお父さんになってくれてよかった。
いまではそう思います。
translation:
I'm so glad that you're my father.
I truly mean that.

japanese:
改めて家族に感謝します。
今日の私があるのは
父、母、そして姉妹のみんなのおかげです。
translation:
Once again, I express my gratitude to my family.
I owe everything to my father, mother,
and all my sisters.

japanese: えっ、私？
translation: Huh, me?

japanese: お前が一花だ。
translation: You're Ichika.

japanese:
長女の一花は、個性豊かな私たちを優しく
まとめてくれるお姉さんです。
translation:
Ichika, the eldest quintuplet,
is our kind big sister
who gently brings together our unique personalities.

japanese:
ご存じの通り大活躍の女優さんで
私の憧れの存在です。
translation:
As you may know,
she is a highly successful actress,
and my role model.

japanese:
なーんだ。
お姉さん、びっくりしたよ。
translation: Oh, is that so? You surprised me.

japanese: 正解。
translation: You are correct.

japanese:
懐かしいな。
お前にはずいぶん手を焼かされた。
translation:
It brings back memories.
You gave me quite a hard time, you know.

japanese:
クールビューティーなんて
世間は謳ってるが俺はだまされねぇ。
translation:
People call you a cool beauty,
but I'm not fooled.

japanese: 自堕落、愚鈍、惰眠を貪る、怠惰だ。
translation:
You're indulgent, dull,
lazy, and you sleep too much.

japanese: そ、そこまで言わなくても……。
translation: Y-you didn't have to go THAT far...

japanese:
それでも強くあろうとする姿が俺には眩しく見えた。
大した長女だよ、お前は。
translation:
But even so,
your determination to be strong appeared dazzling to me.
You're an amazing big sister.

japanese: なんだよー、急にどうした？
translation: What the? Why now, all of a sudden?

japanese:
ふん、せっかくだ。
俺も言いたいことを言わせてもらう。
translation:
Hmph. While I've got the chance,
just let me say what I want to say.

japanese: 次はお前だ、二乃。
translation: You're up next, Nino.

japanese:
次女の二乃は、ちょっぴり怒りん坊だけど
強くて厳しくて私たちの背中を押してくれる
お姉さんです。
translation:
Nino, the second eldest, is a bit of a hot-tempered
girl, but she is a strong, strict older sister
who pushes everyone forward.

japanese: 女子力抜群で、私も見習わなくっちゃいけません。
translation:
Her feminine charm is outstanding,
and I still have much to learn from her.

japanese: そうよ、正解！
translation: That's right!

japanese:
はいはい、よかったわね。
次どうぞ！
translation:
Good job, you got it, you got it!
Next!

japanese: なんでこんな時に……。
translation: Why, at a time like this...

japanese: 四葉だけ当てればいいのよ。
translation: You just need to identify Yotsuba.

japanese:
お前の強さは、その人一倍の弱さの裏返しだ。
厳しさも、それだけ大きな愛情があるから
なんだろうな。
translation:
Your strength is in your compassion for others. 
Even though you act tough, I suppose it's because 
you have so much love to give.

japanese:
あの頃の俺は、
その答えを見つけることができなかった。
すまん。
translation:
I couldn't find the answer at that time.
I'm sorry.

japanese:
いいわよ……。
私は……後悔してない……。
translation:
It's okay...
I...have no regrets...

japanese: そうか。
translation: I see.

japanese: 三玖だな。
translation: Miku, yeah?

japanese: うん。
translation: Yup.

japanese:
三女の三玖は不思議と
お姉さんという感じではありません。
同じ立場で接してきた親友に近いかもしれません。
translation:
Miku, the middle sister, strangely doesn't feel
like an older sister. She feels closer to that of
a dear friend, with whom I share the same standing.

japanese:
だからこそ、自分の夢を叶えた三玖を
尊敬しています。
translation:
That's why I deeply admire Miku,
who has achieved her own dreams.

japanese:
たまに不安になる……。
私……うまくやれてるかな……。
translation:
Sometimes I get worried...
Am I...doing okay...?

japanese: 俺が答えるまでもない。
translation: There's no need for me to even answer that.

japanese:
お前はそうやって常に自分の不安と戦ってきた。
そうして勝ちえた結果は、間違いなくお前の戦果だ。
translation:
You've always fought against your insecurities. 
And as a result you've accomplished so much and more.

japanese:
自分を信じろ。
お前は昔からできる奴だ。
translation:
Believe in yourself.
You are and always have been capable of great things.

japanese:
そう言ってくれると思ってた。
ありがとうフータロー。
translation:
I thought you'd say that.
Thank you, Futaro.

japanese: 残るはお前だ、五月。
translation: And finally, Itsuki.

japanese: えっ。
translation: Huh?

japanese: えっ。
translation: Huh?

japanese: 私が四葉だけど……。
translation: But, I'm Yotsuba...

japanese:
五月は、私が唯一お姉さんをできる可愛い妹です。
実際は私なんかよりずっと
ちゃんとしてるんですけどね。
translation:
Itsuki is my one and only adorable little sister
whom I can be an older sister to. In reality though,
she is much more responsible than me.

japanese:
私がどうしていいか悩んでいる時、
背中を押してくれたのも五月でした。
translation:
When I was struggling with what to do,
it was Itsuki who pushed me forward
and gave me the courage.

japanese: なーんて！
translation: Just kidding!

japanese:
じゃーん、五月でした！
どう？　うまくなったでしょ？
translation:
It was me, Itsuki!
How was that? Did I do well?

japanese: この……焦らせやがって……。
translation: You...teasing me like this...

japanese: この際だから言わせてもらうが！
translation: I have this chance! I'll say it now.

japanese:
お前に会ってからだ！
俺の人生が狂い始めたのは！
translation:
You're the reason my life went off track!
It was meeting you!

japanese: 諸悪の根源！　妖怪カレー食い女！
translation: The root of all evil! The curry-loving yokai woman!

japanese:
……っ！
わ、私だって！
translation: …! W-well, I never!

japanese:
あなたと会うまで、こんなにデリカシーのない人が
いるなんて想像もつきませんでした！
あたまでっかち！　天然キス魔！
translation:
Before I met you, I could have never imagined
that there could be someone so lacking in
delicacy! You smart-ass! Compulsive kisser airhead!

japanese:
やっぱり、あなたとは一生
馬が合いそうにありません！
translation: I just don't think we'll ever get along, you and I!

japanese: 五月……昔の口調に戻ってる。
translation: Itsuki's...using her old way of speaking again.

japanese: 仕方ないよ、フータロー相手だとね。
translation: Well, it's to be expected with Futaro around.

japanese: はぁ……ったく……。
translation: *sigh* Geez...

japanese:
で、余ったお前が四葉な。
はい全問正解。
translation:
And, the last one is you, Yotsuba.
Yep. I got a perfect score.

japanese: あ、あっさり！
translation: Th-that was easy!

japanese:
姉妹のみんながいなかったら、
私の人生はまったく別のものになっていたでしょう。
translation:
If my sisters weren't here,
my life would have been completely different.

japanese:
五つ子ということが
負い目に感じたこともあったけど、
その何倍、何百倍も楽しかった記憶が残っています。
translation:
There were times when I struggled with
being a quintuplet. But for every moment of doubt,
there are hundreds of joyful memories that come to mind.

japanese:
これだけ長く付き合ってりゃ嫌でも覚える。
俺は家庭教師だったが、お前たちからも
多くのことを教わった。
translation:
I've been with you for so long that I can't help
but have learned from you too. I may have been a tutor,
but I've learned a lot from you.

japanese:
私は、みんなと五つ子の姉妹として
生まれることができて幸せでした。
translation:
I feel really blessed to have been born as a sister
to all of you quintuplets.

japanese:
お前たち五つ子に出会えたこと。
数少ない俺の自慢だ。
translation:
Meeting you quintuplets
is one of my proudest achievements.

japanese:
他の家とはちょっと違って
人から見たら奇妙なのかもしれませんが――
translation:
We might seem strange to others,
a little different from other families, but%p-2;――

japanese: 私は、そんな家族が大好きです。
translation: I love my family, so much.
